amendatorysection.catchline: Jurisdictional utility; applicability of other law.
amendatorysection.para: A jurisdictional utility shall not be subject to the State Natural Gas Regulation Act to the extent it is exercising power granted in section 66-2104 except as specifically provided otherwise but shall be subject to sections 75-501 to 75-503.

crossreference.para: State Natural Gas Regulation Act, see section 66-1801.
